titles.title: A bill to provide emergency assistance for independent poultry growers, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide emergency assistance for independent poultry growers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This bill provides funding and establishes requirements for the Department of Agriculture to make specified payments to independent poultry growers that have experienced losses during the COVID-19 public health emergency. An independent poultry grower is a poultry grower that assumes the production and market risks associated with the agricultural production of poultry.
